live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption.
59983.summary: Some customers in Thompson are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
59983.title: Apr 11 - Thompson | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
